text:
Hello everybody,
I need your help about conditions.
**As you see in the video that I have a "boolean" that is connected with "choice".
**And "border-radius" choice is connected with 2 "number" conditions.
**When I directly turn boolean off ( instead of selecting default value that is "search" ), "number" conditions don't disappear. Probably, "choice" remains as a border-radius which makes 2 "number" conditions appear.
<https://share.vidyard.com/watch/6MqhC5D3pkWXF3zhKspREj>?
